variable.name: cards
variable.description: Displays the number of cards being exchanged.

function.name: ifPlural
function.description: Displays text conditionally based on whether the clothing is singular or plural.

function.name: text
function.description: Displays the number of cards being exchanged as a word instead of a number (ex. four rather than 4).

variable.name: clothing
variable.description: Displays the name of the clothing being removed.

function.name: ifPlural
function.description: Displays text conditionally based on whether the clothing is singular or plural.

function.name: generic
function.description: Displays the generic name of the clothing.

function.name: plural
function.description: Displays 'plural' or 'single' depending on if the clothing is plural.

function.name: position
function.description: Displays the clothing's position (upper, lower, etc.).

function.name: toPlural
function.description: Pluralizes the clothing name.

variable.name: marker
variable.description: Displays the value of a marker.

variable.name: weekday
variable.description: Displays the current day of the week.

function.name: number
function.description: Day of the week as a number (1-7, with 1 being Monday and 7 Sunday)

variable.name: month
variable.description: Displays the name of the current month.

function.name: number
function.description: Displays the number of the current month (1-12)

variable.name: day
variable.description: Displays the current day of the month (e.g. 31st)

function.name: number
function.description: Day of the month as a number (1-31)

variable.name: background
variable.description: Displays the name of the background the player is using.

function.name: location
function.description: Displays 'indoors' or 'outdoors' depending on which background is in play.

function.name: time
function.description: Displays 'day' or 'night' depending on which background is in play.

variable.name: target
variable.description: Displays the target's name, same as ~name~.

function.name: costume
function.description: Expands to the ID of the current skin the target is using, or 'default' by default.

function.name: gender
function.description: Expands to male or female depending on the character's gender.

function.name: ifMale
function.description: Displays text conditionally based on whether the target is male or not.

function.name: position
function.description: Expands to left, right, or self based on the target's position on the screen relative to this character.

function.name: size
function.description: Expands to small, medium, or large based on the character's chest or penis size.

function.name: slot
function.description: Expands to 1, 2, 3, or 4 based on the target's position on screen, where 1 is leftmost and 4 is rightmost.

function.name: tag
function.description: Expands to 'true' or 'false' depending on if the target has this tag.

function.name: place
function.description: Expands to the character's current place (1-5) based on layers remaining.

function.name: revplace
function.description: Expands to the character's current place in reverse order (1-5) based on layers remaining, so 1 means in last place.

function.name: lead
function.description: Expands to the number of remaining layers this character has over 2nd place when in the leader, or a negative number difference from the leader if not in first.

function.name: trail
function.description: When in last place, expands to the difference in layers between this character and 2nd to last.

function.name: hand
function.description: Expands to a description of the character's hand (ex. a pair of aces)

function.name: diff
function.description: Difference between the number of layers of this player and other.

param.name: other
param.description: ID of the character to compare to.
